previewArticle.title: Greece vs. Bolivia: Road to Brazil | International Friendly Preview

recapArticle.title: Greece 2, Bolivia 1 | Road to Brazil Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Georgios Samaras (Greece).
Diego Bejarano (Bolivia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Kai Dambach
timelineItems.text: Game time for #GREvBOL. #BOL move left to right, green tops, white shorts, #GRE all white. Wonderful evening, picturesque weather in NJ.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dimitrios Salpingidis (Greece).
Marvin Bejarano (Bolivia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: The Soccer Desk
timelineItems.text: 10': A VERY loud 'Hellas!' chant just rocked Red Bull Arena. #GREvBOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Theofanis Gekas (Greece) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Georgios Samaras with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Graham Parker
timelineItems.text: Gekas with a point blank spin and miss that was just on the truly comical side of beautiful…

timelineItems.name: Mark Baade
timelineItems.text: When you get the ball at your feet in the box, don’t PANIC. #GREvBOL

timelineItems.name: Russell McKenzie
timelineItems.text: Not a good thing when your keeper is noticeably your best player and you're down 1-0 #justsayin

timelineItems.name: Russell McKenzie
timelineItems.text: Karnezis has been tested only once.  This is a much different level than Monday's match.

timelineItems.name: Kai Dambach
timelineItems.text: Halftime in Harrison. 1-0 #GRE with the lone goal. Lots of chances for Greece, need to work on the finishing touch. #GREvBOL

timelineItems.name: Tomek Moczerniuk
timelineItems.text: Halftime at #RedBullArena: #Greece 1 #Bolivia 0. Great atmosphere, mostly by the Greek fans. We need more goals though. #RoadToBrazil

timelineItems.name: Kai Dambach
timelineItems.text: Only down sight tonight is the RB Arena is nowhere near a sellout. A shame, really. Great match so far! 2nd half to start soon. #GREvBOL

timelineItems.name: The Soccer Desk
timelineItems.text: 89': Another error in the box for Greece...another chance missed at another goal. #GREvBOL

timelineItems.name: Russell McKenzie
timelineItems.text: Beautiful defending by Cholebas - playing that raggedy edge between air and foul. Bolivia collects, but loses possession on a hand ball.

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Moreno went off injured after Bolivia had used all subs.

timelineItems.name: Kai Dambach
timelineItems.text: Fernando Santos pushing his men forward, wants one more goal. #GREvBOL 2 minutes of injury time starting now.

timelineItems.text: Into stoppage time now and the Greek supporters are singing the Greece national anthem. #GREvBOL
